DOC.brief_summary: Our study is a prospective multicenter research and the aim is to explore a variety of suitable evaluation indicators and criteria for diagnosis of diffuse liver fibrosis, to get the corresponding diagnosis threshold, with the domestic common pathological S stages as the gold standard.
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy of RTE for Evaluating Hepatic Fibrosis in Chronic Hepatitis: a Prospective Multicenter Study
DOC.criteria: 1. Patient has a history of chronic hepatitis on clinical diagnosis; 2. Patient undergoed liver biopsy during study time. 1. Patient cannot receive examination due to critical condition; 2. Patient refuse the examination.
